item.title: Resume
item.description: Bilguun Byambadorj Experience Data Engineer at Capital One (2019 - Present) Developed web applications using Go and React. Research Assistant at University of Michigan (2018 - 2019) Developed web applications using Go and React. Education Ph.D. Nuclear Science and Engineering from Idaho State University (2014 - 2017) Thesis Title: “Simulating Approach-To-Critical Experiment on EBR-II Reactor” M.S. Nuclear Science and Engineering from Idaho State University (2011 - 2014) Thesis Title: “Upgrade of Deterministic Multi-Energy Group Diffusion Reactor Physics Code” B.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! My name is Bilguun Byambadorj, and I am a data engineer with a strong background in both mathematics and computer science. My journey in the technical field has been diverse and enriching, spanning academia and industry. I graduated in 2011 with a Bachelor of Science in Mathematics and Computer Science. This dual degree laid a solid foundation for my analytical and problem-solving skills, which I further honed during my graduate studies.
